Plot: A documentary on classic video arcade collectors across North America. Those who were the first to look into the neon haze of a vector/raster screen and fall in love. The first quarter poppers, the "vidiots" who never grew up.
Title: The Video Craze
Writer: Dave Danzara, Sean Newton, Natalie Rossetti, Scott Zeiser
Actors: Bryan Armitage, Nathan Barnatt, Chris Connally, Dave Danzara
